helpsettings.title: 更改接收提醒的默认邮件地址
helpsettings.helptext:
如果您想要接收此提醒,您需要在这里设置邮件地址:
工具设置 -> 邮件中心 -> 邮件设置 -> 电子邮件设置

点击这里 查看或者设置当前的邮件地址.
helpsettings.mouseover: 更改接收提醒的默认邮件地址.

helpsettings.title: 如何引用论坛的主题
helpsettings.helptext:
如果您有可用的接口需要引用论坛主题,您可以 点击这里, 或者到这里设置:
工具设置 -> 管理门户插件 -> IPB最近主题 -> 编辑设置

helpsettings.title: 如何添加超级链接
helpsettings.helptext:
如果您想要添加超级链接,您就需要用到 HTML. 关于 HTML,您可以访问这里获得更多 W3Schools.

添加链接的时候,需要遵循下面的格式:
<a href="http://www.您的链接地址.com">链接显示的内容</a>

如果想要换行,您就需要用到这个标签: <br />

helpsettings.title: 禁用签名档
helpsettings.helptext:
您可以阻止会员创建新的签名档,或者通知他们删除已经存在的签名档.您需要做的就是这里设置为: -1

提醒:这个操作不会删除已经存在的签名档.除非您选择编辑会员直接删除他们的签名档.

helpsettings.title: Cookie 作用域
helpsettings.helptext:
您需要在您的域名前面加一个英文的句点.例如,如果您的站点是这个 http://www.您的域名.com/论坛/, 您就需要输入:
.您的域名.com

请不要在这里输入除此之外的任何字符,以防止出错.

如果您使用的是二级域名,例如: http://论坛.您的域名.com,那么,您需要输入:
.论坛.您的域名.com

helpsettings.title: Cookie 名称前缀
helpsettings.helptext:
如果在您的域名下面同时有很多程序在运行,那么这个设置将会非常有用, 因为他们之间可能会互相干扰. 您只需要设置一个区别于其他程序的前缀就可以解决. 例如:
myipb_

如果您运行了几个IPB论坛程序,您也可以这样设置前缀:
第一个论坛: forum1_
第二个论坛: forum2_
等等.

helpsettings.title: Cookie 路径
helpsettings.helptext:
S只有在一些特殊情况下才需要进行此设置. 如果您的 cookies 相互冲突,您就可以在论坛程序目录里单独创建一个文件夹作为 cookies 存放路径. 例如:
/forum

helpsettings.title: 更新主题查看次数
helpsettings.helptext: 大型论坛如果频繁更新主题查看次数可能会出现问题. 有人查看数据的时候主题表就会被访问,频繁操作可能会损坏表单甚至请求被锁死.该项设置为 否 系统会并会每6小时自动更新一次计数器.这将会显著减少对主题表的负载.只有在大型活跃的论坛才需要进行此设置.
helpsettings.mouseover: 如果我需要这样做我改怎么做?

helpsettings.title: 服务器负载限制
helpsettings.helptext:
论坛将会对您的服务器负载进行即时快照,缓冲这个结果大约需要10秒. 需要提醒的是系统负载是跟服务器有关,跟论坛程序本身没有关系.如果您发现您的系统负载值很高,请与您的服务提供商联系,查找是由于什么原因引起.


如果您的服务器操作系统是 Linux, 系统负载取决于:
How many processes are waiting in queue to use the processor on the server. For example, if you have one CPU on your server, then a load of 1.00 would mean there is one process waiting in queue. If you have two CPUs, then 2.00 would be more suitable for that example. As a safe rule, you can enter a limit of 20.

If your server has Windows, the server load relates to:
The CPU usage of the server at that time. As with home computers with Windows, the usage can spike drastically for short periods of time. If you set it at 50, anytime the CPU usage is above 50%, you will get the error message. Also note the board caches the load for 10 seconds, so all users will see the message for a minimum of 10 seconds. On Windows, it is recommended to put it as 100, as the CPU usage monitor is not reliable for tools such as this. By setting it at 100, you will still see the load at the bottom-right of your board, but the board will not give the error when the server load spikes.
helpsettings.mouseover: What to put depending on your operating system...

helpsettings.title: 服务器时区
helpsettings.helptext: 这是游客的默认时区. 游客只有在注册并登录以后才可以设置自己的时区.

helpsettings.title: SMTP 信息
helpsettings.helptext:
此项(其他有关 SMTP 的设置也一样)只有在您在邮件发送方式选择了使用 SMTP 才需要设置. 如果您使用 PHP Mail() 函数, 这些设置将会采用默认设置.

如果您不确定您的 SMTP 信息,请联系您的服务器提供商,通常他们都会提供给您相应的信息.

helpsettings.title: PHP mail() 邮件函数或者使用 SMTP?
helpsettings.helptext: 在通常的PHP安装环境中, PHP mail() 邮件函数是可以使用的.如果您对此不确认, 请联系您的服务器提供商.如果这个函数不可用,或者您在使用中发现很多 邮件错误,建议您切换到 SMTP 方式发送邮件.
helpsettings.mouseover: PHP mail() 邮件函数或者使用 SMTP?

helpsettings.title: Website URL
helpsettings.helptext:
When entering your website URL, be sure to include the full domain. Example: http://www.your-domain.com

If you do not enter the http://, your link will not work correctly.

helpsettings.title: Upload Directory
helpsettings.helptext:
Be sure to check the suggestion for your upload directory in the setting description.

If you still have issues uploading, please ensure your uploads directory is writable using the File Permission Checker.

helpsettings.title: Upload URL
helpsettings.helptext:
Be sure to check the suggestion for your upload URL in the setting description.

If you still have issues uploading, please ensure your uploads directory is writable using the File Permission Checker.

helpsettings.title: Safe Mode Skin
helpsettings.helptext: The System Overview page will let you know if your PHP installation has Safe Mode on. If it does, please enable this setting.
helpsettings.mouseover: Not sure if your are running safe_mode?

helpsettings.title: 会员搜索类型?
helpsettings.helptext: 如果您的服务器支持全文搜索, 强烈建议您使用它. 搜索对论坛会员来说是一项非常重要的功能. 使用全文搜索可以快速、灵活地为存储在数据库中的文本数据查询创建索引.只有在特殊情况下才选择普通搜索.

helpsettings.title: Logging Spider visits
helpsettings.helptext: Enabling spider bot visits can greatly increase the amount of database storage space used. If this is enabled, it is recommended to enable Log Pruning for spider visits.

helpsettings.title: Picking A Group
helpsettings.helptext: When you select a group for search engine bots, they will be able to see and store anything that group has access to. So do not assign them to a special group such as Admins or Moderators, as they will be able to see everything those groups can see - including hidden forums.

helpsettings.title: Using Pre-Made Lists
helpsettings.helptext: Some pre-made lists have a long list of recognized bots. While it is useful to know what bots are visiting your site, large lists can cause many issues. It can cause forum slowness or PHP & SQL errors. It is highly recommended to not enter large lists, but rather enter the ones you feel will visit your site or are important to your site.

helpsettings.title: Setting Up A Trash Can Forum
helpsettings.helptext:
If you do not have a trash can forum setup already, you can create one using the Add New Forum section.

This forum can be called whatever you would like and placed in whatever category. Normally the trash can forum is setup so that only Admins can view the forum. This way you can review all deleted topics, and permanently delete them as needed.
helpsettings.mouseover: Setting up a trash can forum...

helpsettings.title: What Group to Pick?
helpsettings.helptext: The best way to configure this setting is to setup a special user group for people who have no purchased a package as of yet. If you leave this set to 'Validating', it can cause confusion. Once someone validates they would be placed back into the validating group until they pay. Setting up a specific group for unpaid members would allow your members to properly validate, but you would still be able to control what type of board access they have.

helpsettings.title: About Captcha
helpsettings.helptext:
This feature is your first line of defense against spam bots. Most spam bots are unable to get past the registration page when this is set to 'Advanced'. This should stop them before they are able to register. The second line of defense is validation, which can be enabled lower on this page under "New registration email validation?".

If you continue to get spam registrations, you may wish to ban common spamming IP addresses, names, and emails using the Ban Filters.

helpsettings.title: Guest Post Security
helpsettings.helptext: If any of your forums allow guest posting, it is important to set this setting to 'Advanced'. Spam bots commonly search for forums that allow guest posting to spam their sites/links. Most bots cannot bypass the Advanced Captcha, so it will stop your guest forums from being overly spammed.

helpsettings.title: Preview Captcha
helpsettings.helptext: If there is no preview image in this setting, it can mean that your GD installation does not support fonts. If no image is shown, please set this setting to No. If it still does not load, please set Enable Captcha? to Normal for the time being, and consult with your webhost to have them install the GD libraries with font support.

helpsettings.title: Managing Locked Accounts
helpsettings.helptext: If this setting is enabled, you can manage any locked accounts by Clicking Here.

helpsettings.title: Setting Up Validation
helpsettings.helptext:
This setting is important in terms of controlling who can register on your board. Along with the Captcha, this is a good way of reducing the amount of spam your board receives.
Most of the time admins will want their users to validate their email addresses. This can help avoid false registrations and incorrect emails.

For tighter security, you can also enable admin validation. With this enabled, you will have to manually validate all accounts on your board.

To manage your validating accounts, you can view the Manage Validating section.

helpsettings.title: Guest Viewing
helpsettings.helptext: If you enable this setting, this will override all forum specific settings. Guests will not be able to view any part of the board besides a login and registration screen.

helpsettings.title: Stripping Hidden Characters
helpsettings.helptext:
It is important to use this only if your forum is primarily English. Enabling this feature while using non-Latin (English) characters on your board can cause issues with member accounts.

Enable this feature if you have users signing up with duplicate usernames. For example, a user can enter a name with a hidden HTML space in it, so it will appear as though it is the same name of an existing user.

helpsettings.title: Using the Flash Tag
helpsettings.helptext:
To post a flash (.swf) movie into a post, you will need to use the flash tags. The flash tag is use like so:
[flash=199,199]http://www.domain.com/flashmovie.swf[/flash]

The 199,199 in the tag define the height and width of the flash movie. To set the maximum height and width for the flash tags, please Click Here.
helpsettings.mouseover: How to use the flash tag...

helpsettings.title: Enabling Flash
helpsettings.helptext: To enable the use of Flash tags, please Click Here. This can also be found under the Security & Privacy setting group.

helpsettings.title: Enabling Flash
helpsettings.helptext: To enable the use of Flash tags, please Click Here. This can also be found under the Security & Privacy setting group.

helpsettings.title: Creating Polls
helpsettings.helptext:
Polls are enabled on a per-forum basis. When creating a forum, please ensure that the forum settings have polls enabled.

When making a new topic, there will be a text link just below the topic title. This link will allow you to create a new poll for this topic.

helpsettings.title: Adding a Poll
helpsettings.helptext: To add a poll to an existing topic, you must add a reply to the topic. When clicking 'Add Reply', an a text link will appear above the post box to add a new poll.
helpsettings.mouseover: Adding a poll to an existing topic...

helpsettings.title: 会员自定义头衔
helpsettings.helptext: 允许会员自定义头衔将会使会员拥有不受 会员等级 限制的头衔.

helpsettings.title: 在签名档中使用 BBCode
helpsettings.helptext: 如果您想禁止会员在签名档中使用图片,请选择"否". 请注意这禁止了所有 BBCode 的使用,包括 "img" 标签. 即使会员自己在签名档里面添加这个标签,它也是不能解析的.

helpsettings.title: 论坛皮肤选择
helpsettings.helptext: 如果您禁用了此项设置,那么论坛关于皮肤选择的下拉菜单将不再显示. 您也不可以为用户组设置不同的论坛皮肤.他们会使用默认的论坛皮肤设置.

helpsettings.title: Possible hardcoded limit...
helpsettings.helptext: In some cases, there may be a hardcoded limit of 32 characters. To change this, please view the Knowledge Base article relating to this subject.
